Posts.Content: Hi Jules, I have been reading your post and ondered how you were doing with the Tamoxifen, my friend and I have refused it and my friend now takes a drug called Anastrosle which is highly recommended, so if Tamoxifen soes not work you couldask your doctor about this drug, it does not havre the same side effects, check it out on google. Posts.Title: Tamoxifen It Sounds Awful Is it Really That Bad?

Posts.Content: Hi Noj, I had 15 treatments one every day. Your skin does go red and you will need to apply the aqueous cream regulaly. My nipple went crusty approx 2 weeks after I finished my treatment and the scabs just came off in the bath they were not sore, under my breast was open because of the burns and I was given a mild hydrochortozone cream, this helped and my breast is back to normal, although it does feel like sandpaper but my oncologist said this would go with time. i finished my treatment on the 21st february.  good luck Caron x
